name: partitionist

supporting the idea that a country should be divided into separate countries or areas of government: He insists that the agreement is essentially partitionist. This shows how deeply rooted partitionist attitudes really are.

someone who supports the idea that a country should be divided into separate countries or areas of government: There are French-Canadian partitionists who would like Quebec to secede or separate from Canada. The situation has altered, and many partitionists are reconsidering their position.
More examplesFewer examplesPartitionists support policies that will "unmix" ethnic groups, the drawing of new borders, and potential population transfers. She was by now a firm partitionist. The partitionists have presented no credible scenario in which their vision could be achieved without violence.
